title: Example: Image Captioning with Transformers

definitions.Image Captioning: The task of describing the content of an image in words.

summary: The slide provides an example of image captioning using transformers. It defines image captioning as the task of describing an image's content in words. A captioning model is then shown, which has generated the caption 'A happy dog is standing in the ocean' for the image of a dog with a red collar in the ocean.
